duties_responsibilities.duty: Propose, simulate, design, test, and implement improvements to existing medical telemetry products with a focus on cost and quality.
Act as the Operations interface to the R&D team and ensure that new designs are manufacturable, testable, serviceable, and reliable.
Resolve obsolescence and supply chain shortages through component selection or design change.
Complete root cause and failure analysis for field failure problems related to design or manufacturing of the product.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Electronics Engineering or Manufacturing Engineering or equivalent experience
